attributes.title: IM AN EX TRUMP SUPORTER
attributes.review: Mr. President, how could you do this to us. You are stripping America from its constitutional rights. We no longer have freedom of speech, freedom to protest, freedom to live in the country of the free. After everything youve done i can no longer support you. This is the last straw. I hope you understand what a terrible politician you are and i would just like to say that i will not be voting for you this November. You are a racist bigot. Good bye.
